tweet: Today is National #SmallBusinessSaturday! #MN02 is so lucky to be home to so many small businesses - from great burgers in Cannon Falls to boutiques in Zumbrota, I’m proud to work every day on @HouseSmallBiz to help every small business succeed. pic.twitter.com/f109tj9hrJ

In #MN02, 43% of our farms practice no-till or reduced till! No-till helps prevent runoff and soil erosion by improving soil's water holding capacity and ensures farmers’ soil stays healthy for many planting seasons to come. #NoTillNovember

Black women are 3-4 times more likely to die from pregnancy-related causes than white women - this is unconscionable. That’s why I joined @RepUnderwood and @RepAdams’ Black Maternal Health Caucus - to find urgent solutions to this public health crisis.

Last week, I helped introduce the Promoting Service in Transportation Act to help diverse applicants fill in-demand transportation careers across #MN02 - like the air traffic control facility in Farmington and our regional aviation hub, @MSPAirport. https://craig.house.gov/media/press-releases/us-rep-angie-craig-introduces-bipartisan-bill-attract-new-generation …

Congress has a responsibility to keep everyone healthy, no matter where they live. I’ll continue fighting on your behalf to ensure healthcare resources meet Minnesotans where they live.

I introduced the bipartisan Seeding Rural Resilience Act to increase mental health resources for farmers and rural communities across Greater Minnesota, and I support efforts to expand the use of telemedicine to increase healthcare options for rural communities.

Today, on #NationalRuralHealthDay, I want to recognize the unique challenges our rural communities face when accessing quality healthcare. Clinic wait times are untenable and resources are often scarce, and I’m working on several efforts to change that. https://www.washingtonpost.com/national/the-most-remote-emergency-room/2019/11/16/717d08e2-063e-11ea-b17d-8b867891d39d_story.html …

Today, I joined my colleagues on the @TransportDems in voting to keep aviation repair facilities in #MN02! We must ensure high quality jobs are not threatened by outsourcing to foreign countries. pic.twitter.com/wD0bZAvTnX
In MN, Latinas have to work 36 more years to catch up to what men make by age 60. This is unacceptable, we need to pass the #PaycheckFairnessAct! #LatinaEqualPayDay

Don’t forget to join me for my next town hall on Saturday at 10AM at Oak Crest Elementary in Belle Plaine! Looking forward to hearing about how we can work together to address the big issues facing Scott County.

Today is Trans Day of Remembrance. It is unacceptable that so many trans individuals, especially trans women of color,  face violence and murder in this country. We are better than this, and we must #saytheirnames and work to end transphobic violence.

Improving farm credit conditions is essential for the success of MN family farmers. High drug costs endanger lives and make it hard for families to make ends meet. November is Native American Heritage Month. I’m proud to represent two tribal communities in #MN02 and support a number of bills in Congress to ensure they have the resources they need to succeed!
We cannot accept school shootings and senseless violence as normal. Our kids deserve to feel safe at school, and Congress needs to take action to address this epidemic of gun violence - now.

Recent rocket attacks on Israel are unacceptable. The United States must continue to support our ally’s right to defend themselves and work toward peace and safety of all people in the region.
